Package com.ibm.vie.mazerunner

Interface IAnalysisBoard

All Superinterfaces:
IBoard
public interface IAnalysisBoard extends IBoard
This interface allows the player to change the state of the board. It is used by IPlayer#analzeBoard(IAnalysisBoard), because this method receives a copy of the board.
Author:
ntl
